mapper.select: SELECT sc.id, sc.student_id, s.name, sc.course_name, sc.start_date_at, sc.end_date_at FROM students_courses sc INNER JOIN students s ON s.id = sc.student_id
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name = #{name}, kana_name = #{kanaName}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, region = #{region}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students_courses (student_id, course_name, start_date_at, end_date_at) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{startDateAt}, #{endDateAt});
